===Contributors===
The Google API Libraries for Google Web Toolkit is an open source project under the [http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Apache 2.0 license]. If you'd like to get involved building support for your favorite Google API, please read the [http://code.google.com/docreader/#p(gwt-google-apis)s(gwt-google-apis)t(MakingGALGWTBetter) Making the Google API Libraries for GWT Better] guide, and then drop a note on the [http://groups.google.com/group/Google-Web-Toolkit-Contributors GWT Contributor Forum]. 

For a list of all wiki documents in this project, including design documents for upcoming features, see the [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/w/list Wiki document list].
